title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.2 - Accommodation fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.2 - Accommodation fee

State Regulations

An advance payment or transfer of a specified amount of
funds or property by, or on behalf of, an aged person to a facility as full or
partial payment for the promise to provide accommodations for the remainder of
the person's life. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
